TITLE: Victor Andres | Front-End
DESCRIPTION: My professional portfolio, I am a front-end oriented software developer
NAME: Andres Barilin
SHORT-DESCRIPTION: I am not a Bot, I am a Software Developer specialized in Front-end, I love working as a team developing incredible interfaces.

ABOUT-ME.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT-ME.FIRST-P: After encountering the gigantic world of software development, I decided to focus on web development, with a thirst to constantly learn and improve to offer more robust and reliable solutions.
ABOUT-ME.SECOND-P: I like being able to share ideas with the team and learn from their experiences, achieving the best possible results by committing to the project and the client.
ABOUT-ME.THIRD-P: I currently work at Devias as a Front-end Developer mostly focused on “buckedup.com”, an e-commerce established in the United States, for approximately two years and to that I add my experience at ArboT, (robotics company).

PROJECTS.TITLE: My Works
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: In this section you can find some of my work to learn a little more about me.
PROJECTS.BUCKEDUP-DESCRIPTION: This is my current job, it is the e-commerce for a company in the United States, where I worked as a frontend developer.
PROJECTS.B-LARGE-DESCRIPTION: B-Large is an “e-commerce” with Amazon products, and in this personal project I had the opportunity to develop both Front-end and Back-end.

EXPERIENCE.TITLE: Experience
ARBOT: In this position I carried out work more related to robotics, performing tasks such as assembly and designs of electronic boards, 3D design and software development.
While I didn't have the opportunity to use many web technologies, this job allowed me to solve several challenges logically.
It should be noted that currently this company no longer exists.
DEVIAS: This is my first job focused on web software development, where I was able to gain a lot of experience supported by a good team.
I have currently been working in this company for approximately 2 years.
Not only do I do web development, but I also had the opportunity to contribute to the development of a mobile application, using React Native.

EDUCATION.TITLE: EDUCATION
EDUCATION.PLATZI: Platzi is a recognized online education platform, where you will find courses on various topics of which I focus on web development.
EDUCATION.ITEC: iTec is a tertiary education institute where I studied software development, but after 2 years of studying I decided to leave to be self-taught, since I noticed better progress with this modality.
EDUCATION.GOOGLE: On these platforms I stay up to date on the world of technology, and like every developer I also quickly search for information when I find myself solving a problem.

TALK-TO-ME.TITLE: Talk To Me
TEXT: Hello! If you've made it this far, we probably have something interesting to talk about.
I am always open to new connections, exciting ideas and opportunities for collaboration.

If you have a project that sparks curiosity or you just want to chat about the latest technological gadget or your favorite rock music, I'm here! Feel free to send a message and let's make things happen.

FOOTER.RIGHT: Project carried out with Astro and Tailwind
